title: Vaccine Hesitancy and Refusal
itunes:title: Vaccine Hesitancy and Refusal
description:
Dr. Daniel Salmon, Director of the Institute for Vaccine Safety at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses overcoming “vaccine refusal.” Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Team Leader for U.S. Health Care Drew Armstrong talk about the story “There’s More Lysol Than Ever, But It’s Not Enough for the U.S.” Bloomberg Intelligence Senior U.S. Retail Analyst Poonam Goyal breaks down Macy's earnings and shares the overall retail outlook heading into the holidays. And we Drive to the Close with Vinny Catalano, Chief Markets Strategist at Stuyvesant Capital Management.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

And we Drive to the Close with Vinny Catalano, Chief Markets Strategist at Stuyvesant Capital Management.
